name: Burg_51
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues-influenced dialect with Island Creole borrowings
diet centered on preserved fish, seaweed, salted kelp
ritual labor visible in market life
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: Port reliant on seasonal trade for ritual reagents
Navigational auguries used but do not replace charts
